title: Reporting On The Suddenness Of War In Syria
teaser: NPR's Deb Amos and Newsweek's Janine di Giovanni have both covered the Middle East for decades, and Syria since the beginning of the war. As the war enters its fifth year this week, Amos and Di Giovanni look back to how it started, with a quick shift from protests to brutality.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
